choose.otherwise: select count(*) from media_board where(title like '%${_parameter}%' or content like '%${_parameter}%')

choose.when: select a.no as no, a.title as title, a.content as content, a.path as path, date_format(a.reg_date, '%Y-%m-%d %p %h:%i:%s') as regDate, a.file_type as fileType, a.user_no as userNo, b.name as userName, a.hit as hit from media_board a, user b where a.user_no = b.no limit #{page }, #{size }
choose.otherwise: select a.no as no, a.title as title, a.content as content, a.path as path, date_format(a.reg_date, '%Y-%m-%d %p %h:%i:%s') as regDate, a.file_type as fileType, a.user_no as userNo, b.name as userName, a.hit as hit from media_board a, user b where a.user_no = b.no and (title like '%${keyword }%' or content like '%${keyword }%') limit #{page }, #{size }

mapper.select: select no, title, content, path, file_type as fileType from media_board where no=#{no}
mapper.update: update media_board set hit=hit+1 where no=#{no}
mapper.delete: delete from media_board where no = #{no} and user_no = #{userNo}
